key.name: open
key.description: Opens file for a given RPC ID. Example: gsettings set com.geda.gtkwave open 0,/pub/systema_packed.fst

key.name: quit
key.description: Quits viewer for a given RPC ID and return code. Example: gsettings set com.geda.gtkwave quit 0,255

key.name: writesave
key.description: Writes save file. Example: gsettings set com.geda.gtkwave writesave 0,/tmp/this.gtkw gsettings set com.geda.gtkwave writesave 0,+

key.name: reload
key.description: Reloads file for a given RPC ID. Example: gsettings set com.geda.gtkwave reload 0

key.name: zoom-full
key.description: Zoom Full for a given RPC ID. Example: gsettings set com.geda.gtkwave zoom-full 0

key.name: move-to-time
key.description: Moves to a given time for a given RPC ID. Example: gsettings set com.geda.gtkwave move-to-time 0,123ns gsettings set com.geda.gtkwave move-to-time 0,A

key.name: zoom-size
key.description: Sets zoom size for a given RPC ID. Example: gsettings set com.geda.gtkwave zoom-size 0,-4.6

key.name: optimized-vcd
key.description: Value indicates VCD file is optimized.
